Html:
Hi,

I was just wondering if there is source code available for the "Image Demo" option in the demo application. The video tutorial shows the "Draw Demo" and the source code available through download is for the "Defend Demo". I have a requirement which is something like the "Image Demo" option in the demo application. I could not find the source code for the same.

Can anyone please tell me if that is available? Also, my question is how is the map image in the "Image Demo" getting rendered in the display. Is that a graphics image being drawn on the picture box or is that an image inserted in the video buffer of the camera feed.

Can someone please help!!

Thanks!

Anshu Dutta
